title: The Rubin Observatory Hubble Plot
content:
Your Hubble plot was made from observations for a small sample of galaxies. Rubin Observatory will detect millions of supernovae in host galaxies that are much farther away and dimmer than the galaxies you have investigated so far. This plot shows the galaxies you plotted in color, and data for over a thousand supernovae and galaxies detected by Rubin Observatory in grey.

Notice not all the data points fit onto the trendline.

question.label: Do the results you found from your data regarding the expansion of the Universe agree with the Rubin Observatory data? Explain your reasoning.
